languages.text: "Ложь и навет врагов Человечества, Вольный Торговец. Избавьте меня от... подобного".
"Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."
languages.original_text: "Ложь и навет врагов Человечества, Вольный Торговец. Избавьте меня от... подобного".

traits.locale_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of humanity, the Rogue Trader. Spare me from... those."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of humanity, the Rogue Trader. Spare me from... those."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."

languages.text: “这是人类之敌的谎言和诽谤，行商浪人。请不要再提……那件事。”
languages.original_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."

traits.locale_text: “这是人类之敌的谎言和诽谤，行商浪人。请不要再提……那件事。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Embustes y calumnias de los enemigos de la Humanidad, Comerciante Independiente. No quiero saber nada de eso».
languages.original_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."

traits.locale_text: «Embustes y calumnias de los enemigos de la Humanidad, Comerciante Independiente. No quiero saber nada de eso».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Des mensonges et de la calomnie de la part des ennemis de l'humanité, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Épargnez-moi tout ça. »
languages.original_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."

traits.locale_text: « Des mensonges et de la calomnie de la part des ennemis de l'humanité, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Épargnez-moi tout ça. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Lügen und Verleumdung durch Feinde der Menschheit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Verschont mich ... damit."
languages.original_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."

traits.locale_text: "Lügen und Verleumdung durch Feinde der Menschheit, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Verschont mich ... damit."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「人類の敵からの嘘と中傷です、自由開拓者。それについては…勘弁してください」
languages.original_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."

traits.locale_text: 「人類の敵からの嘘と中傷です、自由開拓者。それについては…勘弁してください」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "İnsanlığın düşmanlarının söylediği yalan ve iftiralar Hür Tacir. Külahıma anlat."
languages.original_text: "Lies and slander from the enemies of Humanity, Rogue Trader. Spare me... that."

traits.locale_text: "İnsanlığın Düşmanlarından yalanlar ve iftiralar, Hür Tacir. Külahıma anlat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
